short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find new leads online and sync them to your CRM

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Prospect lets you exceed your sales targets faster than ever before by helping you find highly accurate and targeted B2B leads.

Prospect used and loved by thousands of sales reps from all over the world. This includes Sales Development Reps, Account Executives, Customer Success Managers, and even CEOs at successful companies.

★ Salesforce Integration

Prospect's Salesforce integration will let you seamlessly create new Salesforce Accounts, Contacts, and Leads. Say goodbye to juggling multiple tabs and manually copy-pasting information. It will all be done for you now with a single click.

Prospect is a certified Salesforce AppExchange application. 

Prospect works across all tiers of Salesforce. Our customers have used Prospect with all tiers of Salesforce -- from Essentials to Enterprise.

★ Google Drive Integration

Prospect's Google Drive integration lets you save new leads into a "Prospects" GSuite spreadsheet. This is a really powerful and quick way to build out potential lead lists without having to use a full-fledged CRM.

Prospect's Google Drive integration lets you also collaborate with your colleagues in real-time. Simply share your spreadsheet with your colleagues and work off the same lead list together.

★ Proven and Tested

Prospect has helped small startups increase their sales as well as established enterprises.

For startups, Prospect can help you find your initial beta customers. Past customers have also used Prospect to find potential investors.

For large enterprises, Prospect can help streamline your sales processes and improve efficiency by speeding up your sales reps' workflow.

★ Reliable

We understand that Prospect is a core part of your sales workflow. Our engineering team works hard to maintain a very high level of service uptime.

To do this we're always using the latest technologies to ensure the highest performance and reliability of the service.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Questions? Feedback? Comments?

We would love to hear from you! Email us at support@tryprospect.com and someone from our team will get back to you.
